import React, { useCallback, useState } from 'react' import { Route, Switch, useRouteMatch } from 'react-router-dom' import { useWallet } from 'use-wallet' import WalletProviderModal from '../../components/WalletProviderModal' import styled from 'styled-components' import useModal from '../../hooks/useModal' import BigNumber from 'bignumber.js' import Button from '../../components/Button' import Page from '../../components/Page' import { getMasterChefContract, getQuicContract } from '../../quic/utils' import useQuic from '../../hooks/useQuic' import useRunSetup from '../../hooks/useRunSetup' import useMint from '../../hooks/useMint' import useCapUpdate from '../../hooks/useCapUpdate' import MintModal from './components/MintModal' import CapUpdateModal from './components/CapUpdateModal' const Admin: React.FC = () => { const { path } = useRouteMatch() const { account } = useWallet() const [onPresentWalletProviderModal] = useModal() const quic = useQuic() const chef = getMasterChefContract(quic) const [pendingTx, setPendingTx] = useState(false) const { onRunSetup } = useRunSetup() const { onMint } = useMint() const { onCapUpdate } = useCapUpdate() const [onPresentMint] = useModal( , ) const [onPresentCapUpdate] = useModal( , ) console.log(quic) return ( {account && account === '0xf49eA18Ca30372d8A21D9Ee9e33B1fa7efb7AaE5' ? ( <>
Pending harvest QUIC New rewards per block 1000 QUIC Hello Admin
) : (
)} ) } const StyledActionSpacer = styled.div` height: ${(props) => props.theme.spacing[4]}px; width: ${(props) => props.theme.spacing[4]}px; ` export default Admin
